text: @joncoopertweets Wow what a hypocrite. Isn’t this the same guy who was calling this virus a bunch of BS? Maybe this hypocrite is afraid of being sued. All family of those that died from COVID19 and where avid Fox & Friends eatchets should get together and sue!
